comments: I love this game, it is a good one, but lately I have found a lot of server connection errors specially in this last update so try to fix this problem as soon as you can. I also have a suggestion for a multiplayer game in the original base same like the crater in the next season it would be wonderful to share tasks with friends, also please try to make more free rewards than paid ones to be suitable for young players and unemployed people, thanks.

I normally would give this 5 stars, but there are loading problems for me in this game. I'm afraid I'll lose all my progress and $$ that I've spent. Hopefully this will be resolved by support which I have emailed and I can switch this review to 5 stars. I love the game, but the problems right now are pissing me off. I want my progress back, didn't waste a couple of years playing this game to lose it all. Hopefully I'll hear from support soon

This games was alot of fun until I found out that all it takes is one glitch to cause you to lose everything. I actually PAID MONEY to obtain items that would've otherwise taken forever to get. All was going great until a random glitch because the SEASON UPDATE and I lost everything. No change of ever getting it back now. I talk to customer report, and they doesn't care about the customer instead they just replay us with witty remarks. And that not helping at all. I want my stuff get back

Still a grindy money grab. This game will never leave beta. You put time and money in it and updates just wipe away progress. It seems that the developers don't care about my time or nor do they respect me as a consumer. I'm out this game reminds me of a abusive relationship. You get nice flowers every month to forget the daily pummeling. Don't believe me look at the reaction below.

5 star for THE BEST ONLINE ZOMBIE GAME I ever played! But if you are a newbie, there are things need to consider. > The intro loading is a bit longer than usual game. > The game mechanics is based in real life situation so it is a bit hard. (Not all) > Don't forget to enjoy!!! #ComeToOurClanWeDoHelpEachOther. III % (Clan Name)

title: Tricky Bricky: Solve Brain Teasers & Logic Riddles
description:
Want to increase your IQ level? 🤓 Are you ready to blow your mind from the very first levels? In all those cases and more, Tricky Bricky is right for you! This is not another IQ challenge! 🤔

Tricky Bricky is a free unique brain training game that 100% will freaks you out! 🤷‍♂‍🤷‍♀‍ Here you can find tones of addictive super brain teasers, logic riddles and tricky puzzle games. Challenge yourself, your family and, of course, your friends! Know who is the smarty pants! 🧐

GAME FEATURES:

☝More than 300 unique levels with mind-blowing brain teasers!
☝Unexpected game answers and tricky riddles.
☝"Thinking outside the box" gameplay – challenge & improve your mind!
☝For all ages – addictive thinking game for all family.
☝Great time filler – train your brain everyday and everywhere.

Tricky Bricky is suitable for all ages, but do not let yourself be fooled! Can you solve all our brain teasers? Think outside the box, don't let them stump you, go beyond the usual framework and everything will work out! ☝💡😏

Its ok... A LOT of ads,Doesn't really explain what your trying to do, and It's slow. The actual game part is pretty fun.
Wayyyy to many ads. Its really fun, but every 2 levels their is a ad. And im not exaggerating there is actually a ad every 2 levels.

Cant lie i havent had many ads or notifications which is good but the gameplay is not the best you have to be a type of person to enjoy its contents you will probably enjoy for a week or so before ur bored of it but I had something to do atleast

comments: I like this app. I really do. But I'm sorry, the watermark thing has to go. It's pointless, for what? Too much ads as well. I cant even download a pic without getting 2 or more ads. I can only download maybe like 5 pictures before my last watermark runs out. These two features are making my experience with this app lower. I understand the ads, advertising, I know. But too much ads. I just don't understand the watermark. Without the Watermark, I would've definitely rated this app 4 stars.
Great app but it could be more useful if users were able to write articles with the app.
Have been a user since 2014.. please stop this watermark thing no one does this it's insane I love this app but that's too much .. listen to your users. Thank you

I have three suggestions: 1. Make your interface look better. It's a really early 2000s look going on and you can do better. 2. When you refresh your discover page it really does nothing but give you the same feed just with 3 or 4 new pictures at the top. I'm pretty sure you're not having a shortage of pictures or something so please improve upon this. 3. The watermark thing has to go. Period. Y'all wildin.

I used to LOVE this app to the point I was a heartist for 3 years in a row, I had deleted it for a while to come back to it being a money pit; want to download so many pictures you have to buy a membership, don't want ads buy the membership, ect. its ridiculous, the app used to be a fun outlet for creativity and now half my pictures are under review and its things like plants and art, I really miss the way it used to be, dont bother getting it anymore unless you want to spend $$ over pictures 😢

title: Dailymotion - the home for videos that matter
description:
Are you a video lover searching for the next amazing story? Watch videos wherever life takes you, even when you're not connected to the internet.
•Explore the latest and greatest news, highest quality music, sports and more with our redesigned intuitive dailymotion app for Android.
•Immerse yourself in a world of videos delivered straight from the best publishers or tune into Daily Pulse, our daily selection of trending stories that the world will be talking about tomorrow.
•With dailymotion you can:
•Follow video updates from your favorite people, topics and channels
•Discover Daily Pulse, crafted for people who care about valuable news
•Save videos for later when you’re short on time
•Build and update your own video library
•Save data by taking your library anywhere for free with our offline mode
•Craft your own video playlists for a personalized video experience

comments: I find that sometimes there are technical problems such as the the screen being pixelated(like a television screen type of pixalation) or the app itself not working/crashing without reason (I already checked my internet provider and it seems like it wasn't the source of the problem). I hope such issues would be resolved in the future. The design of the app is very neat and clean. Also, It's great that you've put your policies in the display.

Better than YouTube? Yes. Dailymotion has alot of content, movies to watch, a very clean interface and more up to date sleek channel design look, easy to browse, search filters for searching for videos. There are things which i would like to see for Desktop and Mobile. Dailymotion needs a night mode, the explore page needs a gaming and tech section, search filters needs to have more filters, bring back the thumb's up feature, the browse more section has too much sex and nudity kissing nonsense , that has nothing to do with what you're watching. Great site, but needs more features, but i do recommend Dailymotion over YouTube.

Giving this a 5 stat just because google reeeeeally wants me to delete the app. Whenever I get a notification about deleting apps to make room daily motion is always near the top of the list, despite the fact there are apps I haven't used in almost a year near the bottom. It seems if it's not owned by a big tech corporation Google thinks it's a waste of space on my phone. Couldn't possibly be that google doesn't like a YouTube competator being on my phone.

This actually regards the Smart TV app. It's horrible, logging me out often & we all know how tedious TV "keyboards" are for text entry. I have externally created playlists that do nothing. I can move to each playlist but clicking on it doesn't open it so all playlists are unplayable. Often, recommended videos start playing their audio stream in the background & can't be stopped. Other videos can't be played because unwanted, unstoppable content is already playing. Better 2 cast from Android app

Some, if not most of the videos require following a link to sign up with details. Its hard to find series that you can just watch direct. Plus not all seasons and episodes are available. But as im persistent I take my time to click many videos before I find a link free episode, then enjoy that, but it can be time consuming. Glad it's free tho!

title: World War Heroes: WW2 FPS
description:
WORLD WAR HEROES
Battle players from around the world in crazy WWII-era online combat! 
Destroy the enemy and survive vicious tank battles in the center of Berlin and other cities.
Participate in team and deathmatch battles, and plant bombs and defend them.

Why you'll love World War Heroes:
✯ 7 legendary WWII battle zones!
✯ 4 types of combat equipment from the USA, USSR, Japan and Germany!
✯ 6 game modes and Custom Games where you make your own rules!
✯ Operate your own tank! 
✯ 57 unique weapon types: pistols, rifles, machine guns, shotguns and more!

Combat rules:

✯ Team battle! ✯
Two teams go head-to-head. The winner is whichever team gets the most points by the end of the round

✯ Deathmatch! ✯
Soldiers! It's every man for himself! The winner is whoever gets the most points by the end of the round!

✯ Bomb mode! ✯
One team plants the bomb, and the other team tries to stop them

✯ One-life battle! ✯
A team battle where players only have one life. The goal: be the last man standing

✯ Custom mode! ✯
Create games with your own rules! Make your own lobby with a friend and play as a team!


✯✯✯ HUGE ARSENAL OF WEAPONS! ✯✯✯ 
All sorts of new weapons will be available to help your team come out on top. Use the whole arsenal, featuring machine guns, grenades, rifles, sniper rifles, bazookas, etc.

✯✯✯ AMAZING GRAPHICS AND OPTIMIZATION! ✯✯✯ 
Dive into online combat with crisp graphics and intuitive controls.

✯✯✯ UPGRADE ARMOR AND WEAPONS! ✯✯✯
Build your dream arsenal by upgrading damage and max ammo and decreasing kickback and reload time

✯✯✯ DAILY REWARDS! ✯✯✯
Play every day to earn free prizes and get daily tasks and tons of free stuff!
Complete daily tasks and upgrade your gear!

The game is specially optimized to work on both strong and weaker devices!
Absolutely free to download!
GOOD LUCK, SOLDIER! 

========================

========================
Join our VKontakte group: https://vk.com/worldwarheroes
Join our Facebook group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/1261472480647068/
Subscribe on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UChMfgo6g8ri0FaAR-SpYpXw

developerAddress: Cyprus
recentChanges:
- New battle pass season
- New weapons
- Vehicle and weapon balance reworked
- Achievement display system in battle updated
- Weapon upgrade system changed
- Fixed bug where Spanish randomly changed to Russian in the game
- Minor bug fixes
- Game productivity optimization
comments: Game play is fun. However, I feel like they don't do a good job of matching up teams, and the fact that it costs so much for decent weapons. Gold rewards should be higher, and weapon costs should be reduced. I shouldn't have to play for 2 years to earn enough gold to purchase a decent weapon. *update* Since posting this things have changed a lot. The crates that cost 5 gold are finally giving me something other than my 5 gold back, matches are more evenly matched as well.

Weapon upgrade method is good after new update. But what seems to be human hands moving from the ground is not good at all. Because it's against the game being real. And the weapons damage rate is very high. There is little chance of recovery. Control is a bit difficult. And the sounds are unbearable. Over all the game is much better.

This is a great game except for a few major issues which are: 1) the game play is glitchy and not smooth, 2) your aim is constantly getting thrown off if the enemy so much as moves an inch, so you end up missing most of the time, 3) the aim help is no help whatsoever, and 4) every time you are hit or an explosion goes off near you, your gun is thrown around which just compounds the aiming problem. I dont understand what the problem is because Modern Strike Online by Azur has no such issues.

I love this game. I've been playing it for so long and I really appreciate the effort they made to make it more balanced and fairer overall for free-to-play players. But the problems is there supposedly is a gmail that supposedly listens to players' suggestions, critics and problems but I've never got a reply regarding my matters. I really hope that the developers can fix that issue otherwise this game is a must-play and is so enjoyable. I still really appreciate it if I get my problem fixed. ty

I must edit my review to better reflect the real issues this game has. The main issue really isn't that it's pay to play, it's not. It's the match making. The match making causes under upgraded and developed players to be thrown into combat with waaaaay more upgraded players. I like the upgrade system, but perhaps ditching it for a tier based system would work best. Or perhaps adapting the upgrade system to a tier based system would work best. In this way, you can then match make by tier.

title: Black White Interracial Dating - Interracial Match
description:
Interracial Dating: The New Enlightenment

Less than a century ago, interracial dating was something you didn’t talk about, and something to hide if you did prefer a person of a different color.  There were few places you could go to safely without causing some sort of scandal, and even fewer people who were willing to listen with understanding.  

Maybe it was the rhythm and blues saturating the basements of late night entertainment.  Maybe it was a society lifting out of the Great Depression, with more tolerance accompanying their more affluent life styles.  Maybe it was the boldness of writers, spokes people and celebrities campaigning for civil rights, but by the 1960’s, interracial dating slowly became more acceptable.  

The changing times brought its own set of problems.  Even as the work force became more integrated, with minorities and women stepping into roles once designed for white, professional males, and public places ceased separating or refusing services to minorities, interracial dating was still awkward.  It was an era of general agreement on civil rights, but there weren’t very many among the Depression Years parents who were prepared to bring racial integration into the home. 
 
The Millennial Perspective

The awkward early years of racial integration jump-started interracial dating.  Today, seven percent of the population claims a mixed race heritage.  The number is growing rapidly, with most interviewee’s stating pride in their multiracial origins and claiming their heritage has made them more open to other cultures. 
 
Seven percent is significantly higher than in the 1970’s, when only one percent declared a mixed race background, but analysts feel these number are actually only about half the actual percentage, as many who are mixed race claim only one ethnic background.  The majority of those who claim only one race are middle-aged or older.  
From Age to Regional Location

The younger you are, the easier it is to find a partner for interracial dating.  The twenty to thirty year old set are generally very casual and already have a wide mixture of multi-cultural and multi-racial friends.  Tolerance, however, especially by family and community, can vary greatly according to demographics.  In many areas, especially regions that historically disapproved of mixed race dating, there may no longer be taboos, but the cultural clash still exists.  The family, and even your date, might have stereotypical views of your personal tastes and behaviors.  

Crossing the barriers where racial misconceptions still exist takes fortitude and patience.  Interracial views are changing rapidly but not racial views.  You may experience those uncomfortable moments of somebody going out of their way not to offend you, anxieties concerning appropriate behaviors, or even suspicion and reserved behaviors.  

Unless you are dating someone with exactly the same historical background, social status and religion, you are still going to be challenged by your date’s customs.  For many races, the customs are more engrained than color, status or ancestral origins.  Religion may be an important influence on their lives, even if they no longer declare a religious preference, as they will make time for the traditional values of their family. 
 
But that’s part of what interracial dating is all about.  It’s an opportunity to take a broader look at the world around us, to improve our communications with others, and learn about differing cultures and customs that can enrich our everyday lives.

comments: As a free user it seemed okay so I tried Premium. Since becoming a Premium member I have had problems with other Premium members not being able to see my messages. I contacted CS and I got some message (24+hrs later) back that told me to please be patient and wait for their new version?! Doesn't really help! It would also be nice if you could swipe to answer a message

Great app with lots of potential of meeting someone special from around the world. They listen to suggestions and take feedback very seriously which is a plus. You might have to buy the premium to get the full experience though but overall, I had a great experience using this.

Terrible. Nothing but bots aimed to get you to spend money. I get everyone wants to make money and if this were legit I would happily pay. But it was clear in less than 12 hours that this was set up to get you spending before any real connection could even take place. Shame shame shame.

I hate to say this but I had this app in the beginning it was a good app budget app freezes up I am a paying customer and I cannot use it I wish someone would correct this issue oh I am going to cancel my prescription for good
Easy to use, search local, regional, national and worldwide. Great features. Definitely recommended
